comment.caption: The Wider Image: Taiwan's "notebook boy" commits his memories in writing
comment.note: A notebook of 26-year-old Chen Hong-zhi, who suffers from short-term memory loss, shows his daily notes at his home in Hsinchu, Taiwan, July 31, 2018. REUTERS/Tyrone Siu SEARCH "SIU MEMORY" FOR THIS STORY. SEARCH "WIDER IMAGE" FOR ALL STORIES. - RC166F1CB220
